title: State v. Chester Hollman III – Episode 2 – This Story Is A Lie
description:
February 12, 2018 / Rabia, Susan and Colin explore the suspect’s statements in the 1991 murder of Tae Jung Ho.  

  Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon, Blue Dot Sessions.

Thank you to Stamps, Boll & Branch, and ZipRecruiter for sponsoring this episode!

4 week FREE trial + postage + digital scale. www.Stamps.com enter UNDISCLOSED.

$50 off your first set of sheet at www.BollandBranch.com and using promo code UNDISCLOSED.

Try ZipRecruiter for FREE by going to www.ZipRecruiter.com/Undisclosed. 

#undisclosed #chesterhollman
